description: Roman Todd finds himself at the hotel bar flirting with cutie Brandon Wilde, he tells him that Brandon is exactly his type and if he can get them a room he can do more than compliment him. Brandon cannot resist the charm of bad boy Roman. They instantly hit the hotel room and get straight to business. It's playtime for these two. Sucking cock and fucking asses aggressively is exactly what they needed to add a little spice in their lives!
title: Just My Type
